item.title: About
item.author: slh.peyman@gmail.com (Peyman Salehi)
item.description: My name is Peyman Salehi. I’m a software engineer. Most of my experiences are in back-end development. Besides that, I’m very enthusiastic about system engineering and spend my free time researching and learning more about it. In my blog, I mostly write about what I learn or experience in my job, and it’s usually related to software engineering, programming languages, Linux, open-source software, and tools I use. And finally, I’m working in tech to make things easier for ourselves, not doing weird stuff!
